title: Unreasonable BAN in Japanese Server
body:
Im playing in Japanese Server,and I know I should not write here.But Japanese player is really in trouble.I need your help.
Yesterday morning,

replies.body: I've got this account pulled up, and it doesn't have any bans placed on it at the moment. Were you referring to a different account? The one you're on now is in the NA region and you mentioned the account in question being on JP. Hit me back with the right account and I'll be able to look into it for ya!
